[[inst_ld_and]]
==== LD.AND

*Syntax:* ld.and<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic And operation: memory value is atomically anded with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_and.svg[LD.AND encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
